- Settings are now available within the app! Check it out.
- Added the ability to hide categories and symbols from the keyboard.
- Added multiline text editing within the app.
- Key Click Sounds now play when typing symbols in the app.

◎ Haptic feedback for iPhone 7 and 7 Plus
◎ New iOS 10 key click sounds support

◎ Haptic feedback for iPhone 7 and 7 Plus

◢ Introducing Code and HTML ◣
Now it is easy to work with Unicode Code Points and HTML Entities.

◎ Tap a symbol to add to the text field
◉ Tap and hold a symbol to access a menu of options allowing you to choose what to copy

Now optimized for iPhone Ⅹ and its stunning Super Retina display! This update also includes a few minor enhancements including improved Handoff support.
Now optimized for iPhone Ⅹ and its stunning Super Retina display! This update also includes a few minor enhancements including improved Handoff support.

Now optimized for iPhone Ⅹ and its stunning Super Retina display! This update also includes a few minor enhancements including improved Handoff support, and resolves an issue that caused deselected symbols to remain visible in UniChar Keyboard.

Now optimized for iPhone Ⅹ and its stunning Super Retina display! This update also includes a few minor enhancements including improved Handoff support, and resolves an issue that caused deselected symbols to remain visible in UniChar Keyboard.

This update
► resolves an issue where digit symbols may not always appear while using UniChar Keyboard in numeric text fields.
► renames Search by Text to Search by Name. Did you know you can search by typing in the HTML entity, code point entity, o

This update
► resolves an issue where digit symbols may not always appear while using UniChar Keyboard in numeric text fields.
► renames Search by Text to Search by Name. Did you know you can search by typing in the HTML entity, code point entity, o

This update includes minor enhancements and bug fixes. Now a lot of drawings have been submitted to train Search by Drawing! But to enable searching all symbols, many more are needed. Please submit your drawings! To get there, tap the Search bar ▻ Search

This update includes minor enhancements and bug fixes. Now a lot of drawings have been submitted to train Search by Drawing! But to enable searching all symbols, many more are needed. Please submit your drawings! To get there, tap the Search bar ▻ Search

Attention iOS 12 beta users! This update is for you. Get a sneak peak at new symbols coming to UniChar with iOS 12. Submit drawings of the new symbols to train the app to recognize them. With your help we can ensure these symbols will be searchable. I wan

This update resolves an issue where the Search by Drawing keyboard may not appear.

UniChar is now optimized for iOS 12 and the brand new iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max. The Apple Watch app is optimized for watchOS 5 and Apple Watch Series 4. This update also includes the following improvements:

New Symbols
■ More than 1,500 symbo
Search by Text is more powerful now with noncontiguous words search and other minor enhancements.
This update includes minor bug fixes and enhancements. Not very exciting, I know, but it also lays the groundwork for neat things to come.

If you have iOS 13 beta installed, this is a special update for you! Check out the new symbols coming with iOS 13 in Train Search by Drawing. Submit your own drawings of the new symbols to teach the app to recognize them. With your help we can ensure thes

This update contains a small bug fix when training Search by Drawing. Thanks to those of you who have submitted drawings, especially if you're using iOS 13 beta! A good number have been received but we need many more. Please continue to submit yours!
Now it's quicker to help improve Search by Drawing – tap the banner at the top to submit your drawings. Thanks for your contributions!
This update adds full support for mouse and trackpad pointer interactions on iPadOS 13.4.

■ Added the ability to hide Recently Used and Favorites from the keyboard
■ Added support for multiple windows on iPad
■ Optimized for floating keyboard on iPad
■ Other minor enhancements
This update includes minor bug fixes and enhancements.
This update includes minor bug fixes and enhancements.

This update includes improvements to Search by Drawing, support for iOS and iPadOS 14, and more.

Search by Drawing
● A new drawing classification model improves accuracy, recognizes more symbols, and significantly reduces the app download size
Family Sharing for in-app purchases is now supported!

⁃ Ability to jump to a specific code point in the Unicode table
⁃ Other minor enhancements and bug fixes
This update includes stability improvements.
